description: Villa Aretusi is a pleasant 17C villa surrounded by its own garden on the outskirts of Bologna. At the hotel’s gourmet restaurant, Sotto l’Arco, on the first floor (lift available), the skilful chef creates modern, interesting Italian dishes, while at the Trattoria on the ground floor the focus is more on traditional Emilian cuisine.
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Car park, Garden or park, Terrace, Wheelchair access
